greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smaller of Smith brothers.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000 (terms 1..1000 from Robert Israel)
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Smith Brothers.
maple: if isprime(n) then return false fi;
sort(convert(S intersect map(`-`,S,1), list)); # _Robert Israel_, Jan 15 2018
program: (PARI) isone(n) = {if (!isprime(n), f = factor(n); sumdigits(n) == sum(k=1, #f~, f[k,2]*sumdigits(f[k,1])););}
results.author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
